STEPDISC CANDISC - oliveoil dataset# 

[1]:

#disable warnings
from warnings import simplefilter, filterwarnings
simplefilter(action='ignore', category=FutureWarning)
filterwarnings("ignore")
from great_tables import GT, html
def print_dt(data,title=None,subtitle=None,rowname=None,digits=8):
    dt = (GT(data=data.round(digits).rename_axis(rowname).reset_index())
          .tab_header(title=title, subtitle=subtitle))
    return dt

oliveoil dataset# 

[2]:

#vins dataset
from discrimintools.datasets import load_oliveoil
D = load_oliveoil("train")
(
    GT(D.head().rename_axis("").reset_index())
    .tab_header(title=html("<b>Olive Oil dataset - training data</b>"))
)

[2]:
Olive Oil dataset - training data
CLASSE palmitic palmitoleic stearic oleic linoleic linolenic arachidic eicosenoic

1 Centre_North 990 120 250 7750 870 10 10 2
2 Centre_North 1020 100 220 7530 1030 0 0 3
3 Centre_North 1098 54 202 7945 595 42 32 2
4 Centre_North 1120 80 260 7750 680 30 80 3

instanciation & training# 

[3]:

from discrimintools import CANDISC
#split into X and y
y, X = D["CLASSE"], D.drop(columns=["CLASSE"])
clf = CANDISC(n_components=2)
clf.fit(X,y)

[3]:

CANDISC()
In a Jupyter environment, please rerun this cell to show the HTML representation or trust the notebook.
On GitHub, the HTML representation is unable to render, please try loading this page with nbviewer.org.

n_components  2
classes  None
warn_message  True

forward# 

[4]:

from discrimintools import STEPDISC
clf2 = STEPDISC(method="forward",alpha=0.01,verbose=True)
clf2.fit(clf)

Evaluation of prediction on testing dataset# 

[7]:

#testining data
DTest = load_oliveoil("test")
#split into X and y
yTest, XTest = DTest["CLASSE"], DTest.drop(columns=["CLASSE"])
#evaluation of prediction on testing dataset
eval_test = clf2.eval_predict(XTest,yTest,verbose=True)

backward selection# 

[8]:

#backward selection
clf2 = STEPDISC(method="backward",alpha=0.01,verbose=True)
clf2.fit(clf)


====================== Step 1 backward selection results =======================
         Wilks' Lambda  Partial R-Square      F Value  Num DF  Den DF  Pr>F
stearic            1.0           0.96804  8465.862059       2     559   0.0

No variable can be removed


Since only one feature is selected, CANDISC procedure cannot be updated.
